text:
@realDonaldTrump Give it a rest, Bubs. 
You’re lying 
But, gee, it’s Easter, people are dying from Covid19, and you haven’t said a word of condolence or sympathy. 
Just shut up. For one day. Shut up. 
Let us try to see glory in the day and promise in the future without your incessant, needy bs.
